George Washington Foster (1866 ruo 1923) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ nke steeti New Jersey nyere ikike na 1908, na mgbe e mesịrị New York (1916)
Foster sonyeere Vertner Woodson Tandy (1885X1949), onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ nke steeti New York nyere ikike, na ụlọ ọrụ Tandy na Foster, nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike site na 1908 ruo 1914.
A mụrụ George Washington Foster, Jr
na Disemba 18, 1866, na Virginia. Nna ya bụ onye na-agba ịnyịnya na nne ya bụ nwa Jefferson Davis
Ọ kwagara Newark, New Jersey mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ.
Foster gara ụlọ akwụkwọ abalị na Cooper Union ma mụọ ihe owuwu.

A na-ekwu na Foster rụrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs Henry Hardenbergh site na 1888 ruo 1889, onye chepụtara ihe ịrịba ama nke New York City Dakota Apartment Building, Plaza Hotel, na Waldorf-Astoria mbụ, na ebe dị ugbu a nke Empire State Building
N'oge ya na Hardenbergh, ọ gaara arụ ọrụ na Waldorf Hotel na 1892. O nwekwara ike ịbụ na ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Flatiron Building, nke ụlọ ọrụ D
Burnham nke dị na Chicago rụrụ.
N'ihe dị ka 1908, Foster zutere Vertner Woodson Tandy, onye mbụ debanyere aha na New York Afrịka-Amerịka architect ma guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ Tandy & Foster ọnụ. Tandy & Foster chepụtara St
Philip's Episcopal Church (Harlem, New York) na 1910
Mgbe 1915, e nyere Foster ikike ịrụ ọrụ na New York ma nọgide n'ọfịs nke ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ. Ha rụkwara ọrụ na Mother AME Zion Church na Harlem.
Ya na nwunye ya, Carrie, kwagara Park Ridge, New Jersey n'ụlọ o chepụtara ma wuo. Ya na nwunye ya nwere ụmụ isii, gụnyere Henry Hardenburg Foster, onye akpọrọ aha onye were ya n'ọrụ.
Ọ nwụrụ na Disemba 20, 1923, n'ụlọ o mepụtara na Colony Avenue, na Bergen County, Park Ridge, New Jersey. E liri ya na Westwood Cemetery na Westwood, New Jersey.
